QuestData.Title: Uncovering the Past
QuestData.Description: Interested in being a Lorewalker? There is lots of digging and reading and digging and more reading.$b$bI have entire days where I stare at a broken vase trying to figure out how it goes back together.$b$bShould give it a try. Go solve one artifact of Pandaria and we will appreciate you sharing the knowledge of how you did it.
QuestData.RewardText: Wow! You got the pieces to meld together so well. The quality of this restoration is amazing.$b$bHow did you do it?
